omniProcessElements.name: filesLength

childElements.description: context-id -- SObjectId like QuoteId, OpportunityId,OrderId & ContractId selected-template -- selected Template JSON node from previous step. debug -- optional for debugging document-title -- Overrides the Default Document Name/Title of your document
